TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivatedClientTypeEntry extends System.Runtime.Remoting.TypeEntry

summary.span: 存有物件型別的值，此物件型別在用戶端上登錄為可在伺服器上啟動的型別。

span.span: Holds values for an object type registered on the client end as a type that can be activated on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立用戶端上的用戶端啟用物件的執行個體，您必須知道其，且必須在用戶端中登錄使用方法。To create an instance of a client-activated object on the client, you must know its and it must be registered on the client by using the method. 若要取得的 proxy 必須先註冊用戶端的用戶端啟用的物件的新執行個體與通道，然後再啟動物件藉由呼叫`new`。To obtain a proxy for a new instance of the client-activated object the client must first register a channel with and then activate the object by calling `new`. 若要啟動的用戶端啟用物件類型`new`關鍵字，您必須先註冊在用戶端使用的物件型別方法。To activate a client-activated object type with the `new` keyword, you must first register the object type on the client using the method. 藉由呼叫您會賦予的遠端執行功能基礎結構的遠端應用程式位置其中`new`嘗試建立它。By calling you are giving the remoting infrastructure the location of the remote application where `new` attempts to create it. 如果您使用相反地，方法建立的新執行個體的用戶端啟用物件，您必須提供遠端應用程式的 URL 做為參數，因此需要將用戶端上的沒有之前註冊。If, on the other hand, you use the method to create a new instance of the client-activated object, you must supply the remote application's URL as a parameter, so no prior registration on the client end is necessary. 若要提供的伺服器 url 的方法您想要建立的物件，您必須將封裝中的執行個體的 URL類別。To supply the method with the URL of the server on which you want to create the object, you must encapsulate the URL in an instance of the class. 如已啟動用戶端物件和啟動遠端物件的詳細說明，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e90d0c64-00da-4080-ae78-a6c558825c25)。For a detailed description of client activated objects and remote object activation see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e90d0c64-00da-4080-ae78-a6c558825c25). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用註冊用戶端啟動遠端物件。The following code example shows how to use a to register a client activated remote object. 這個範例包含三個部分、 用戶端、 伺服器和用戶端和伺服器所使用的遠端物件。The example contains three parts, a client, a server, and a remote object used by the client and server. 下列程式碼範例示範的用戶端：The following code example shows a client: remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前尚未實作這個索引子，在其上的作業不會產生任何結果。Currently, this indexer is not implemented and operations on it will not produce any results. 屬性會提供內容屬性，當加入，可以強制執行原則，例如同步處理或交易。 attributes provide context properties that, when added to a , can enforce policies such as synchronization or transactions.
